room_title: Escape room "Bunker" by Riddle Room in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Great time! We completed the Bunker challenge and it was more challenging than expected, but thankfully we saved the world, with just under 3 minutes to spare! Whew! Thanks to our host John for answering our questions.

room_title: Escape room "Bunker" by Riddle Room in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: They certainly know how to set up some great riddles! Went with a group for a friend's birthday to save the world from a nuclear annihilation and had loads of fun! If you like the fun of solving multiple kinds of puzzles, teamed a time limit urgency (you only have 1 hour), you definitely want to check the joint out.

room_title: Escape room "Bunker" by Riddle Room in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Completed the Bunker with a group of five. The puzzles are just challenging enough, and the whole experience is very well put-together. Would highly recommend for a night out with friends that's different than the usual dinner/drinks/movie. It's fun to see how everyone approaches the puzzles differently, sees things from different perspectives, and work together to complete it.
